origin.chickensorigins.pixie.name: Pixie
origin.chickensorigins.pixie.description: The smallest and trickiest of races.
power.chickensorigins.pixie/feather_foot: The pixie's small size means they fall slower and cannot take fall damage.
power.chickensorigins.pixie/flight.name: Flight
power.chickensorigins.pixie/flight.descr: Pixies are blessed with the gift of flight however their wings prevent the use of Elytras.
power.chickensorigins.pixie/mischief_lau: Cause a loud bang and escape quickly before they see you!
power.chickensorigins.pixie/pixie_proper: Pixies are some of the smallest creatures to roam the land, rarely reaching even the height of a regular person's knee.
power.chickensorigins.pixie/soaked.name: Soaked
power.chickensorigins.pixie/soaked.descr: Being as small as they are, water poses a significant threat to pixies. It hampers their movement and impairs their ability to fly.
power.chickensorigins.pixie/troublemaker: Villagers know pixies by the legends of trouble they cause, and will refuse to trade with them.
